column2: Bean & Veggie Burrito, Time: 12, Portions: 1, Calories: 420, Ingredients: Tortilla, Black beans: 1 can, Corn: 50g, Rice: 80g, Procedure: Heat beans with corn, add cooked rice, wrap in tortilla with salsa.
